photoeffects: My Colors (My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White, Positive Film, Lighter Skin Tone, Darker Skin Tone, Vivid Blue, Vivid Green, Vivid Red, Custom Color)
weight: Approx. 212 g (including battery/batteries and memory card)
brightness: Adjustable to one of five levels
batteries: Rechargeable Li-ion Battery NB-6L (battery and charger supplied)
computer: Hi-Speed USB (MTP, PTP) dedicated connector (Mini-B compatible)
canonprinters: Canon SELPHY Compact Photo Printers and Canon Inkjet Printers supporting PictBridge (ID Photo Print, Fixed Size Print and Movie Print supported on SELPHY CP & ES printers only)
continuousshooting: Approx. 1.1 shots/sec. (until memory card becomes full)
afsystempoints: AiAF (Face Detection / 9-point), 1-point AF (fixed to centre or Face Select and Track)
selftimer: Approx. 2 or 10 sec., Custom or FaceSelf-Timer
type: SD, SDHC, MMC, MMCplus, HC MMCplus
stillimagetype: JPEG compression, (Exif 2.2 [Exif Print] compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system, Digital Print Order Format [DPOF] Version 1.1 compliant
closestfocusingdistance: 3cm (W) from front of lens in macro
construction: 6 elements in 5 groups (1 double sided aspherical UA element, 1 single sided UA element)
monitor: 6.2 cm (2.5”) PureColor LCD II (TFT), Approx. 230, 000 dots
modes: Auto*, P, Movie, Special Scene (Portrait, Landscape, Night Snapshot, Kids & Pets, Indoor, Sunset, Fireworks, Long Shutter, Beach, Underwater, Aquarium, Foliage, Snow, ISO 3200¹, Color Accent, Color Swap, Stitch Assist)
settings: Auto (including Face Detection WB), Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Underwater, Custom
meteringmodes: Evaluative (linked to Face Detection AF frame), Centre-weighted average, Spot (centre)
zoom: Optical 3x. Digital approx. 4x  (with Digital Tele-Converter approx. 1.5x or 2.0x and Safety Zoom ). Combined approx. 12x
movielength: Up to 4GB or 1 hour (L and M)
menulanguages: English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Chinese (traditional), Japanese, Russian, Portuguese, Korean, Greek, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Thai, Arabic, Ukrainian, Romanian, Farsi
